question: Select the statements that are true for the recurrence relation.

options.answer: The base case is only when both strings have length 0
The base case is only when the 1st string has length 0
The base case is only when the 2nd string has length 0
The recurrence relation finds the maximum over 3 values.
If the last letter matches, the count is increased by 1
The base case returns the current count.
